BackstoryDef.title: Frontier Blacksmith
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was the town's go-to for tools, horseshoes, and weapons. With a hammer in hand, [PAWN_pronoun] forged both metal and community connections. Though [PAWN_pronoun] had little time for books, [PAWN_pronoun] was a master of [PAWN_possessive] trade and took pride in every piece of ironwork that left [PAWN_possessive] forge.

BackstoryDef.title: Itinerant Preacher
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] roamed from town to town, spreading the good word and offering solace to troubled souls. [PAWN_pronoun] had a gift for speech, but found it hard to stomach violence or bloodshed, often offering words over weapons. Though some folks called [PAWN_pronoun] naïve, [PAWN_pronoun] remained steadfast in faith and purpose.

BackstoryDef.title: Outlaw Sharpshooter
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Life on the run made [PAWN_nameDef] quick on the draw and sharp-eyed. [PAWN_pronoun] was known for taking on the toughest jobs, eliminating rival gang members from afar. Despite [PAWN_possessive] talent with a rifle, [PAWN_pronoun] had little patience for animals and even less for honest labor.

BackstoryDef.title: Wilderness Guide
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] made a living leading travelers through the harsh frontier, navigating rough trails and hostile terrain. [PAWN_pronoun] was sharp-eyed and quick-witted, knowing which plants could heal and which trails were best avoided. Though [PAWN_pronoun] was a master in survival, [PAWN_pronoun] lacked finesse in social graces, preferring the quiet of nature to the chatter of strangers.

BackstoryDef.title: Saloon Surgeon
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] ran a small infirmary in the back of a dusty saloon, treating anyone who could pay or barter a fair deal. From bullet wounds to broken bones, [PAWN_pronoun] saw it all and never shied away from the blood and grime of the frontier. [PAWN_pronoun] preferred [PAWN_possessive] patients over people and never had much patience for haggling or livestock.

BackstoryDef.title: Grizzled Barkeep
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] owned a rowdy saloon on the edge of town, serving watered-down whiskey and swapping stories with dusty travelers. Though [PAWN_pronoun] was known to give advice to folks in need, [PAWN_pronoun] didn’t have much patience for troublemakers or haggling over drinks. [PAWN_pronoun] preferred the quiet moments after last call and avoided animals, preferring the company of [PAWN_possessive] patrons to livestock any day.
